ygData.subject: RE: OMG!  GZ finally replied
ygData.msgSnippet: Today I was attacked in Beholder s Maze by a magician s pet that had been charmed by an evil eye (I assume, at least :)  It was red to me, and it kept rooting
ygData.messageBody:
Today I was attacked in Beholder's Maze by a magician's pet that had been
charmed by an evil eye (I assume, at least :) It was red to me, and it
kept rooting me, or whatever it's specific spell. I never resisted or
anything :( I had no clue what to do, just kept singing Hymn for a
while. Finally, at about 2 bbls of health left, I realized I had
Melanie's Mellifluous Motion memorized, and tried it out just to see if it
would work. It did!!! I was able to back up the 2 feet to the zone and
start breathing again. Does this song break other types of roots?

..................................Selianth Jongleure
..Bard of the 23rd Song (still :P)
..Cazic-Thule

Beth Frantz "The musician's art is to send light
beth@... into the depths of men's hearts"
--Robert Schumann

On Wed, 10 Nov 1999, JasonF wrote:

>
> > GZ: Selo's breaking root has been back and forth since Beta 1. We had it
> > breaking root for a while, but this proved to be just too
> > powerful, since it
> > is a free song that bards keep mem'd all the time.
>
> I think we had all suspected that Selo's breaking root had been deliberately
> changed while they were in fixing the Selo's/SoW issues. Selo's breaking
> root *was* very powerful, as you not only broke root but were in Turbo Mode
> when it broke. That said, the song that we wouldn't keep memmed all the
> time and that *should* break root is Disenchanting Melody, and it's broken.
> So let's hope ADM gets fixed very soon.
>
